message:
Hi guys,
I'm a graphic designer and a .net developer,
Iam planning to buy a laptop that works best for the graphic design as well for the dotnet. so which laptop should i buy? and if its an Apple, is there any work around to develop .net apps on a Mac? 

Photoshop, Illustrator, Indesign, 3d Max, Visual Studio.
Price doesn't matter.
Thanks

data.message: any thing can handle all those graphics equipment should be enough for .net  :) , u can get an apple and install windows with mac , this is my current  env.

If you get a Mac you'll have to get the 2.2-.5GHz CPU/16GB RAM model at least and maybe 265GB SSD.  This will be too expensive.

On the other hand, it's easy to find similar specs cheaper in many other brands. You can also use less RAM like 12GB or even 8GB.
